channel.title: Error on my server "your account is already loged in please try again"
channel.description:
ok randon time my server gets this message "your account is already loged in please try again" it happens to every 1 at once and no 1 is logged in my it says u are and to try again!
how do i fix this so is wont give this error !
Thanks b15

item.title: Error on my server "your account is already loged in please try again"
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

telenim you had the best answer so far so thanks! rep++
my server is deltascape based and warscape aswell. thanks to you ill keep it on a 60 min auto restarter. right now its at 100 min.
of any 1 has a better answer please be sure to post
Thanks,
B15

Read full topic
item.source: Error on my server "your account is already loged in please try again"

item.title: Error on my server "your account is already loged in please try again"
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I have no idea how to fix this, I ran a few servers like DeltaScape back in 2008 and noticed that this has happened on my server too. It annoyed people so they suggested an auto restarter every hour, since it only happened when the server was online for over 60 minutes. It could be happening because of server lag.

Read full topic

item.title: Error on my server "your account is already loged in please try again"
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

This problem is very common in 508 servers most of all the 508 servers have them. No one has yet to release a way to solve this problem some of the top coders say you cant.
